approaches.title: What it means to be a pangram
approaches.blurb: Use all to check that all letters are present.

approaches.title: Is the alphabet contained in the input?
approaches.blurb: Use isSubsequenceOf or isSubsetOf to check that the alphabet is part of the input.

approaches.title: Cross off all letters at once
approaches.blurb: Walking over the input, cross off letters of the alphabet as you go and finally check that none are left.

approaches.title: Cross off letters one by one
approaches.blurb: Walking over the input, cross off letters of the alphabet one by one, continuously checking whether all have been removed already.
